entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk imports CustomBeforeDirectoryBuildProps after DirectoryBuildPropsPath #36749
  • Runtime identifier not validated by dotnet build if --no-self-contained is passed #36746
  • Multi-arch/framework in restore/build/publish commands #36727

Closed

  • # I have a fix ! #36286
  • Add flag to stop using the workload set version and just use the installed manifests #34562
  • Support for workload set versions - authoring workload set assets and packages #34282
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Unstable][Regression]"Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host..." error happens during publish project in CLI. #36643

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged

Merged

  • Allow trailing commas in launch settings JSON for dotnet watch #36744
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2311021 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx
